item.title: Toshiba Libretto 50CT project
item.description: Toshiba Libretto 50CT It’s an old (1997) laptop. It has Pentium-75 and 16MB of RAM. Its screen is 640x480 pixels big (sans a couple of dead ones). Mine lacks the port replicator, so the only connections I have are IR, PC Card and speaker ports. No floppy/CD drive either. My plans for it My plans on it depend on how broken it actually is, but I’m torn between a retro-gaming machine and a tiny off-the-grid workstation.
